text: Marco Artunghi (born 12 July 1969) is an Italian former professional racing cyclist. He rode in four editions of the Tour de France, two editions of the Giro d'Italia and one edition of the Vuelta a España. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Lombardy Category:Giro d'Italia cyclists Category:Tour de France cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Marco Artunghi
